Title: Relates to the re-assignment of police officers pending certain investigations and hearings
Summary: Relates to the re-assignment of police officers pending certain investigations of incompetency or misconduct involving egregious behavior including, but not limited to, police brutality, intimidation, racial profiling, planting or fabricating evidence, unwarranted search and seizure, violating department procedures, and abuse of authority, and provides for an expeditious investigation of such incidents.
LawCode: Amd ยง75, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the re-assignment of police officers pending certain investigations and hearings
